name: Circuit Breaker
description: Circuit Breaker is a self-hosted homelab visualization platform that lets you document, map, and understand your infrastructure — hardware, services, networks, and everything in between — through an interactive topology map and rack simulator. Features include vendor device catalog, telemetry integration (iDRAC, iLO, APC UPS, SNMP), markdown documentation, and rich theming.
